enhanced_description: Eubrics is a Gen-AI enabled workplace upskilling platform designed to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency within organizations. It delivers gamified, personalized development journeys meticulously customized for each employee's specific job role and personality. The platform leverages real-time job actions and daily feedback nudges to help employees acquire high-performing work skills in a measurable and sustainable manner. Key features include AI Mentorship for cutting-edge guidance, daily motivational nudges, actionable insights for immediate guidance, and a comprehensive learning repository for both theoretical knowledge and practical application. Eubrics also offers a 'Role Profiler & Readiness' tool, providing simulated tests to clarify role requirements and identify capability gaps, and a 'Habit Salon' for a curated, gamified path unique to every user's preferences and needs. Its focus on 'Flow of Work' ensures seamless integration into everyday tasks, contributing to its reported 70% adoption rate.
